name: European Third Party Providers Association
goal: Defend the interest of European FinTech companies active as (or planning to be active as ) Third Party Providers (TPPs) as defined in the European Payment Service Directive (EU) 2015/2366 (PSD2)
euInitiatives:
European Banking Authority (EBA) PSD2 RTS
European Cenral Bank (ECB) SEPA API
Directive (EU) 2015/2366 (PSD2)
